storyList.story: When the Work Result was "Bad," a significant increase in Enkephalin generation was observed. When the Work Result was "Good," employees who had completed the Managerial Work experienced an overall increase of their reaction speed. If there are no notable issues present, Managerial Work should be oriented to options that yield greater energy, Marton. - Hohenheim, Chief Researcher No issues requiring special precautions have been observed yet, Boss. - Marton There is a notable detail regarding combat experiment results. The higher the internal charge level, the more sharply the overall combat-related metrics increased for this Abnormality. In such a case, it is advised to evade, guard, or at least assess the situation before launching a counterattack. - Alyssa

At regular intervals, the corridor in front of Ardor Blossom Moth's containment unit would be littered with its embers. When the embers landed on 5 employees, the entity breached containment. Always check for the presence of embers before entering that area of the corridor—they're extremely hot and, of course, will cause quite a bit of pain if they land on you. Do keep in mind that regular means of fire suppression won't work on them, either. - Marton When the Work Result was "Good", there was a high probability that all embers would disappear. - Hohenheim, Chief Researcher Employees in proximity regained their psychological stability following the destruction of the escaped Ardor Blossom Moth's wings. E.G.O Attunement levels also saw meaningful increase. Also, do not—and I repeat—do NOT use any fire-related E.G.O gear when attempting to suppress it. Not when it's in a state of Partial Deterrence Release due to containment breach. Please. - Alyssa
